sen.j: この寺の創建年代については不詳であるが、平安時代初期嵯峨天皇が皇后の安産祈願のため地蔵菩薩を安置し、空海が開眼したとも伝えられる。
sen.e: Although the year of its establishment is unknown, it is said that the Emperor Saga enshrined Jizo Bosatsu consecrated by Kukai to pray for his wife's safe delivery in the early Heian period.

Although the year of its establishment is unknown, it is said that in the early Heian period the Emperor Saga, to pray for his wife's safe delivery, enshrined Jizo Bosatsu who was later consecrated by the monk Kukai.

sen.e: Although the year of its establishment is unknown, it is said that in the early Heian period the Emperor Saga, to pray for his wife's safe delivery, enshrined Jizo Bosatsu who was later consecrated by the monk Kukai.

sen.j: その後、江戸時代の1738年（元文3年）諸堂が再建されているが、近代に入って荒廃し大正年間（1912年～1926年）に復興されている。
sen.e: Later in 1738, the several halls were reconstructed during the Edo period, but were later ruined in the Meiji period and were again reconstructed during the Taisho period (1912-1926).
